attributes.action: commission a crack commando unit that was possibly sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit but escaped to the underground and today, still wanted, they survive as soldiers of fortune. Well my god we have a problem and Mr Brown we know you can find them so maybe, just maybe we could hire. . . . the A-team. To make it a mandatory requirment to be automactically enlisted in the armed forces after twelve months on unemployement benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
